text: Liz Claiborne, Inc. is a fashion company based in New York City and founded in 1976 by a fashion designer of the same name. The organization markets clothing and fragrances. In the 1980s it was the first company from a female to hit the Fortune 500 mark. The company was created by Liz Claiborne the person. Category:Fashion houses Category:Companies based in New York City Category:1976 establishments in New York (state)
title: Liz Claiborne
